sense.def:
To imply
pomeni namigniti, da je nekaj res, ne da bi to tudi v resnici rekli.

seg.quote: At one point she implied she would marry me.
In Malta this gesture implies heavy sarcasm.

sense.def:
Kadar določene okoliščine
imply that something is the case
, dajo vedeti, da je nekaj tako, kot je videti.

seg.quote: These discoveries imply that the sea-bed is rich in fossil fuels.
